column4: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
provides amixer and other ALSA utilities.
outputs a logo and various system information, need it for the matrix look.
is a job scheduler.
uses the python-i3ipc library to switch the layout between horizontal and vertical splits depending on the currently focused window dimensions in i3.
is a meta package which defines (and prevents from removing) a basic Arch Linux installation.
is a meta package which contains a complete build environment for makepkg.
can highlight code output and display files.
is used for a dropdown calculator.
is a versatile name server software which provides dig, host, and other utilities.
is a cross-platform open-source make system, is needed to compile YCM vim plugin.
provides a colorful diff, useful for e.g. SVN diffs.
extends Perl module management from CPAN and aims to be zero configuration and integrates with local::db.
generates an index file of language objects found in source files, is needed by TagBar, CtrlP vim plugins.
allows to run multiple Docker containers at once.
allows your computer to access dos-like filesystems.
is a customizable and lightweight notification system.
...also needed by Doom Emacs...
is needed for shell functions using FZF, and by Doom Emacs as well.
is an image viewer, useful to set a wallpaper.
is a program for making large letters (ascii art) out of ordinary text.
is a backend used by thunar-archive-plugin to create and modify archives.
is a fuzzy finder tool.
provides trash support, mounting with udisks and remote filesystems for Thunar.
CLI source code highlighter, needed for colorful ranger file preview.
is like xsetroot, but the background is preserved no matter how many times picom is restarted.
allows to mount iOS devices.
is needed to check Wi-Fi signal strength for i3blocks.
is needed to parse i3 workspace information JSON.
is a password manager, useful to save JetBrains IDEs passwords.
is a cross-platform community-driven port of Keepass password manager, provides org.freedesktop.secrets (optional for chromium, git, teams, necessary for code-features).
is a PAM compatible module for KDE Wallet, used to unlock KDE Wallet automatically on login.
is a password store which I use for Subversion credentials.
are 32-bit NVIDIA drivers utilities needed to run some games on Steam.
is a FreeType-based font drawing library for X.
is a terminal browser.
is used for accessing documentation in man pages.
document the Linux kernel and C library interfaces that are employed by user-space programs.
provides viewing information about media files for ranger.
provides glxinfo among other essential Mesa utilities.
is a collection of useful unix tools.
is a command line user interface for mpd.
is a lightweight server-client arch. music player daemon.
is the patrician's choice video player.
is a terminal RSS client.
provides the latest LTS version of Node.js.
is an expansive font package.
is an emoji font.
is a minimalist image viewer.
allows accessing NTFS partitions.
lets you build and execute shell command lines from STDIN in parallel.
is for transparency and removing screen-tearing.
needed for RustDesk.
is a database server.
allows to manage multiple Python versions.
is a Python client for Neovim.
is an extremely fast Python package and project manager.
retrieves and filters (by country, etc.) the latest Pacman mirror list.
...also needed by Doom Emacs...
is a window switcher, application launcher and dmenu replacement.
is needed for colorls.
is a messaging app.
is a timer and a stopwatch in a terminal.
is used for accessing documentation in info pages.
unzips zips.
is a session / policy manager for PipeWire
manages Xfce desktop settings, needed for Thunar 'Open Terminal Here' custom action (which uses exo-open).
is the graphical server.
enables changing screen brightness levels.
aids with resolution determination and screen recording.
starts the graphical server.
is a tool for detecting window properties.
allows to customize monitor arrangements.
allows querying information about windows.
can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link.
is a pdf viewer with vim-like bindings.
allows mupdf pdf compatibility in zathura.
displays graphical dialog boxes from shell scripts, needed for Thunar 'Create New File' custom action.
is a modern shell.
